entityname.snackcart_candycane_tt_ltt:
Candy Cane Cart
Click to select and then place the candy cane cart, a holiday favorite treat.
entityname.binoculars_tt_ltt:
Snowman Binocular Stand
Click to select and then place the snowman binocular stand. Guests will love viewing animals through his goggles.
entityname.Reindeer_tt_ltt:
Reindeer Bouncy Ride
Click to select and then place a reindeer bouncy ride, on which small children can sit and bounce.
entityname.lowholidayfence_tt_ltt:
Low Holiday Fence
Click to select and then place sections of low holiday fence, which can serve as a festive holiday path border.
entityname.lowholidayfence_broken_tt_ltt:
Low Holiday Fence
Click to select and then place sections of low holiday fence, which can serve as a festive holiday path border.
entityname.PresentApple_ltt:
Holiday Present (Apple)
Click to select and then place the holiday present (apple). Animals that enjoy eating apples will love opening this holiday present.
entityname.PresentBeef_ltt:
Holiday Present (Beef)
Click to select and then place the holiday present (beef). Animals that enjoy eating the beef shank will love opening this holiday present.
entityname.Candycane_ltt:
Candy Cane
Everyone loves a candy cane during the holidays.
entityname.EatCandycaneNotLike: I'd prefer something other than a candy cane.
entityname.EatCandycane: Mmm. Candy cane! Must be that time of year!.
entityname.EatCandycaneLike: Oh boy! This candy cane is great.

cell.color:
The candy cane cart is a dessert cart crafted from gingerbread, candy cane and assorted candies. The candy cane cart sells candy canes.
Children especially love candy canes, but anyone who wants a tasty dessert will buy candy canes.

The snowman binocular stand is a special version of the binocular stand for the holidays or in tundra-themed areas of the zoo.
Guests will be able to get a really good view of animals through the snowman's goggles. The animals seem to think nothing of a snowman watching them.

The holiday fence is an average-strength fence type that is most effective when used in combination with a ditch or moat, or as decorative fencing in public areas.
The holiday fence is decorated in festive holiday lights, which both the guests and animals find fascinating.
Kids can climb onto the reindeer's back and bounce up and down on the reindeer bouncy ride. Although the reindeer bounces, this particular specimen does not fly.

Even animals enjoy a holiday present!
The holiday present (apple) is a box covered in colorful wrapping paper and a festive bow. Animals love to bat the box around for fun.
After the animals have knocked the present around for a while, it will break open and reveal an apple that the animal can then eat.

Even animals enjoy a holiday present!
The holiday present (beef) is a box covered in colorful wrapping paper and a festive bow. Animals love to bat the box around for fun.
After the animals have knocked the present around for a while, it will break open and reveal a beef shank that the animal can then eat.
